summary.span: 表示可以添加到 的实例的程序集绑定信息。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 更改的属性实例不会影响任何现有。Changing the properties of an instance does not affect any existing . 它可能会影响仅创建一个新，当方法调用与实例作为参数。It can affect only the creation of a new , when the method is called with the instance as a parameter. 此类实现 接口。This class implements the interface. > [!CAUTION] > 默认值为属性为 false。The default value for the property is false. 此设置是不安全的服务。This setting is unsafe for services. 若要防止服务下载部分受信任的代码，请将此属性设置为 trueTo help prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to true

summary.span: 获取或设置 委托，该委托表示在初始化应用程序域时调用的回调方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the delegate, which represents a callback method that is invoked when the application domain is initialized.

value.span: 一个委托，表示在初始化应用程序域时调用的回调方法。

span.span: A delegate that represents a callback method that is invoked when the application domain is initialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将信息传递给回调方法，将分配到的字符串数组属性。To pass information to the callback method, assign an array of strings to the property. 数组传递给回调方法每次初始化。The array is passed to the callback method each time an is initialized. 在新创建的应用程序域的上下文中执行回调方法。The callback method is executed in the context of the newly created application domain. ## Examples 下面的示例创建名为的子应用程序域`ChildDomain`，并使用对象和从默认应用程序域证据。The following example creates a child application domain named `ChildDomain`, using an object and evidence from the default application domain. 属性设置为回调方法`AppDomainInit`，初始化子域时调用。The property is set to the callback method `AppDomainInit`, which is invoked when the child domain is initialized. 回调方法的参数放置在一个字符串，该值将赋给数组中属性。The arguments for the callback method are placed in an array of strings, which is assigned to the property. 创建子域后，回调方法只是输出字符串。When the child domain is created, the callback method simply prints the strings. [!code-cpp[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置传给 委托所表示的回调方法的参数。

span.span: Gets or sets the arguments passed to the callback method represented by the delegate.

summary.span: 在初始化应用程序域时将调用该回调方法。

span.span: The callback method is invoked when the application domain is initialized.

value.span: 一个字符串数组，当在 初始化过程中调用 委托所表示的回调方法时，该字符串数组将被传给该回调方法。

span.span: An array of strings that is passed to the callback method represented by the delegate, when the callback method is invoked during initialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定过程中会调用的回调方法初始化。Use the property to specify a callback method that is invoked during initialization. 如果属性未设置，则不使用分配给此属性的数组。If the property is not set, the array assigned to this property is not used. 在新创建的应用程序域的上下文中执行回调方法。The callback method is executed in the context of the newly created application domain. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建名为的子应用程序域`ChildDomain`，并使用对象和从默认应用程序域证据。The following code example creates a child application domain named `ChildDomain`, using an object and evidence from the default application domain. 属性设置为回调方法`AppDomainInit`，初始化子域时调用。The property is set to the callback method `AppDomainInit`, which is invoked when the child domain is initialized. 回调方法的参数放置在一个字符串，该值将赋给数组中属性。The arguments for the callback method are placed in an array of strings, which is assigned to the property. 创建子域后，回调方法只是输出字符串。When the child domain is created, the callback method simply prints the strings. [!code-cpp[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppDomainInitializer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AppDomainInitializer/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AppDomainManagerAssembly { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AppDomainManagerAssembly : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置程序集的显示名称，该程序集为使用 对象创建的应用程序域提供应用程序域管理器的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the display name of the assembly that provides the type of the application domain manager for application domains created using this object.

value.span: 程序集的显示名称，该程序集提供应用程序域管理器的 。

span.span: The display name of the assembly that provides the of the application domain manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定应用程序域管理器的类型，请将这两个此属性设置和属性。To specify the type of the application domain manager, set both this property and the property. 如果未设置这些属性，另一个被忽略。If either of these properties is not set, the other is ignored. 如果不提供任何类型，从与父应用程序域相同的类型创建应用程序域管理器 (即，从该应用程序域调用方法)。If no type is provided, the application domain manager is created from the same type as the parent application domain (that is, the application domain from which the method is called). 加载应用程序域时，程序集不存在，或者该程序集不包含由指定的类型则会引发属性。When the application domain is loaded, is thrown if the assembly does not exist, or if the assembly does not contain the type specified by the property. 如果找到的程序集，但版本信息不匹配会引发。 is thrown if the assembly is found but the version information does not match. 若要设置默认应用程序域的应用程序域管理器，请使用[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md)并[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md)中的元素[\<运行时 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)部分中的应用程序配置文件或使用环境变量中所述。To set the application domain manager for the default application domain, use the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md) and [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md) elements in the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of the application configuration file, or use the environment variables described in . 此功能需要应用程序具有完全信任。This feature requires the application to have full trust. （例如，在桌面上运行的应用程序具有完全信任。）如果应用程序不具有完全信任，引发。(For example, an application running on the desktop has full trust.) If the application does not have full trust, a is thrown. 由给定的程序集显示名称的格式属性。The format of the assembly display name is given by the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置类型的全名，该类型可为使用此 对象创建的应用程序域提供应用程序域管理器。

span.span: Gets or sets the full name of the type that provides the application domain manager for application domains created using this object.

value.span: 类型的全名，其中包括命名空间。

span.span: The full name of the type, including the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定应用程序域管理器的类型，请将这两个此属性设置和属性。To specify the type of the application domain manager, set both this property and the property. 如果未设置这些属性，另一个被忽略。If either of these properties is not set, the other is ignored. 如果不提供任何类型，从与父应用程序域相同的类型创建应用程序域管理器 (即，从该应用程序域调用方法)。If no type is provided, the application domain manager is created from the same type as the parent application domain (that is, the application domain from which the method is called). 加载应用程序域时，如果通过指定的程序集，将引发属性不包含此属性指定的类型。When the application domain is loaded, is thrown if the assembly specified by the property does not contain the type specified by this property. 若要设置默认应用程序域的应用程序域管理器，请使用[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md)并[ \](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md)中的元素[\<运行时 >](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md)部分中的应用程序配置文件或使用环境变量中所述。To set the application domain manager for the default application domain, use the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagerassembly-element.md) and [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/appdomainmanagertype-element.md) elements in the [\](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/runtime-element.md) section of the application configuration file, or use the environment variables described in . 此功能需要应用程序具有完全信任。This feature requires the application to have full trust. （例如，在桌面上运行的应用程序具有完全信任。）如果应用程序不具有完全信任，引发。(For example, an application running on the desktop has full trust.) If the application does not have full trust, a is thrown. 由给定的一种类型的全名格式属性。The format of the full name of a type is given by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ApplicationBase { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ApplicationBase : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置包含该应用程序的目录的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the directory containing the application.

value.span: 应用程序基目录的名称。

span.span: The name of the application base directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序基目录是程序集管理器开始探测程序集。The application base directory is where the assembly manager begins probing for assemblies. 属性可以影响到应用程序域授予的权限。The property can influence which permissions are granted to an application domain. 例如，应用程序域通常源自本地计算机接收基于源及其位置的完全信任。For example, an application domain originating from the local computer normally receives full trust based on its location of origin. 但是，如果属性的设置为 intranet 目录的完整名称设置将限制授予应用程序域到 LocalIntranet 授予即使应用程序域的权限实际上来自本地计算机。However, if the property of that is set to the full name of an intranet directory, the setting restricts the permissions granted to the application domain to a LocalIntranet grant even though the application domain actually originates from the local computer. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来设置程序集加载程序开始探测程序集加载到新的应用程序域的位置。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to set the location where the assembly loader begins probing for assemblies to load into a new application domain. > [!NOTE] > 您必须确保你指定的文件夹存在。You must ensure that the folder you specify exists. [!code-cpp[ADApplicationBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADApplicationBase/CPP/adapplicationbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADApplicationBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADApplicationBase/CS/adapplicationbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADApplicationBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADApplicationBase/VB/adapplicationbase.vb#1)]

span.span: for access to the path information.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ApplicationName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ApplicationName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.

value.span: 应用程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置时创建新的应用程序域的属性。The following example shows how to set the property when you create a new application domain. 该示例创建一个新的应用程序域，然后调用方法的示例程序集加载到新的应用程序域并创建的实例`Worker`类。The example creates a new application domain, and then calls the method to load the example assembly into the new application domain and create an instance of the `Worker` class. `Worker`类继承，因此该示例可以使用返回的代理调用`TestLoad`方法。The `Worker` class inherits , so the example can use the proxy returned by to call the `TestLoad` method. `TestLoad`方法加载指定程序集。The `TestLoad` method loads an assembly that you specify. 必须指定有效的完全限定的程序集名称，或注释掉方法。You must either specify a valid, fully qualified assembly name, or comment out the method. `TestLoad`方法列出的程序集加载到新的应用程序域，并显示你指定的程序集和示例程序集将加载。The `TestLoad` method lists the assemblies that are loaded into the new application domain, showing that your specified assembly and the example assembly are loaded. 该示例使用特性告诉程序集加载程序如何在应用程序将在应用程序域之间共享代码。The example uses the attribute to tell the assembly loader how the application will share code across application domains. [!code-cpp[ADMultiDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADMultiDomain/CPP/admultidomain.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADMultiDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADMultiDomain/CS/admultidomain.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADMultiDomain#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADMultiDomain/VB/admultidomain.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置特定于应用程序且从中对文件进行卷影复制的区域的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of an area specific to the application where files are shadow copied.

value.span: 从中对文件进行卷影复制的目录路径和文件名的完全限定名。

span.span: The fully qualified name of the directory path and file name where files are shadow copied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使此属性产生任何影响，还必须设置属性。In order for this property to have an effect, the property must also be set. 如果未设置属性，属性将被忽略，并且卷影副本缓存位置默认为下载缓存。If the property is not set, the property is ignored and the shadow copy cache location defaults to the download cache. 卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅[卷影复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).

Shadow Copying Assemblies

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ConfigurationFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ConfigurationFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序域的配置文件的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the configuration file for an application domain.

value.span: 配置文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置文件描述的搜索规则和应用程序域的配置数据。The configuration file describes the search rules and configuration data for the application domain. 创建应用程序域的主机负责提供此数据，因为有意义的值不同情形。The host that creates the application domain is responsible for supplying this data because the meaningful values vary from situation to situation. 例如，ASP.NET 应用程序的配置数据存储的每个应用程序、 站点和计算机，可执行文件的配置数据存储的每个应用程序、 用户和计算机时。For example, the configuration data for ASP.NET applications is stored for each application, site, and computer, while the configuration data for an executable is stored for each application, user, and computer. 只有主机知道特定情况的配置数据的具体信息。Only the host knows the specifics of the configuration data for a particular circumstance.

span.span: for access to the path information.
Associated enumeration:
Runtime Settings Schema

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowApplicationBaseProbing { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DisallowApplicationBaseProbing : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指定在搜索要加载的程序集时是否探测应用程序基路径和专用二进制路径。

span.span: Specifies whether the application base path and private binary path are probed when searching for assemblies to load.

value.span: 如果不允许探测，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if probing is not allowed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，则属性将被忽略。If the property is `true`, the value of the property is ignored. 通过指定的目录中的探测没有任何程序集，即属性。That is, no assemblies are probed for in the directories specified by the property. 此外，值属性和属性将被忽略。In addition, the values of the property and the property are ignored. 任何程序集指定的目录中探测属性。No assemblies are probed for in the directories specified by the property. 属性提供一层额外的加载进程的控制。The property provides an additional layer of control over the loading process. 在正常的程序集加载序列，应用程序基探测之前引发事件。In the normal assembly loading sequence, the application base is probed before the event is raised. 但是，某些应用程序可能需要从文档中的 OLE 复合文件或都不在全局程序集缓存中，也不在指定的目录中的唯一已知位置加载的程序集和属性。However, some applications might need to load assemblies from an OLE compound file within a document, or from a unique known location that is neither in the global assembly cache nor in the directories specified by the and properties. 此类应用程序可以使用属性以避免导致正常探测的延迟并避免加载必需的程序集可能会在正常的探测路径中找到的副本。Such applications can use the property to avoid the delay caused by normal probing, and to avoid loading copies of the necessary assembly that might be located in the normal probing paths.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowBindingRedirects { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DisallowBindingRedirects : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应用程序域是否允许程序集绑定重定向。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an application domain allows assembly binding redirection.

value.span: 如果不允许程序集的重定向，则为 ；如果允许，则为 。

span.span: if redirection of assemblies is not allowed; if it is allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性旨在供服务和服务器应用程序程序集绑定重定向不是应用程序方案的一部分。The property is designed to be used by services and server applications where assembly binding redirection is not part of the application scenario.

value.span: 如果不允许通过 HTTP 下载程序集，则为 ；如果允许则为 。

span.span: if HTTP download of assemblies is not allowed; if it is allowed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性旨在供服务和服务器应用程序从 intranet 或 Internet 下载代码不是应用程序方案的一部分。The property is designed to be used by services and server applications where downloading code from an intranet or the Internet is not part of the application scenario. > [!CAUTION] > 默认值为属性是`false`。The default value for the property is `false`. 此设置是不安全的服务。This setting is unsafe for services. 若要防止服务下载部分受信任的代码，请将此属性设置为`true`。To help prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DisallowPublisherPolicy { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.DisallowPublisherPolicy : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将配置文件的 [<publisherPolicy>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/publisherpolicy-element.md) 部分应用于应用程序域。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [<publisherPolicy>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/publisherpolicy-element.md) section of the configuration file is applied to an application domain.

value.span: 如果忽略应用程序域配置文件的 部分，则为 ；如果接受所声明的发行者策略，则为 。

span.span: if the section of the configuration file for an application domain is ignored; if the declared publisher policy is honored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅适用于本地加载的 Web 应用程序。The property specifically applies to a Web application that is loaded locally. 使用此属性以帮助防止恶意尝试在安全模式下执行不安全的 Web 应用程序。Use this property to help prevent a malicious attempt to execute an unsafe Web application in safe mode. 有关跳过发布服务器策略的详细信息，请参阅[重定向程序集版本](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/redirect-assembly-versions.md)主题。For more information about bypassing publisher policy, see the [Redirecting Assembly Versions](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/redirect-assembly-versions.md) topic. 有关安全模式的详细信息，请参阅的"检查配置文件"部分[运行时如何定位程序集](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md)主题。For more information about safe mode, see the "Examining the Configuration Files" section of the [How the Runtime Locates Assemblies](~/docs/framework/deployment/how-the-runtime-locates-assemblies.md) topic.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DynamicBase { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DynamicBase : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置动态生成的文件所在的目录的基目录。

span.span: Gets or sets the base directory where the directory for dynamically generated files is located.

value.span: 所在的目录。

span.span: The directory where the is located.

para.span: 该属性的返回值不同于分配的值。

span.span: The return value of this property is different from the value assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性设置为新的应用程序域的动态目录将位于的基目录。Use this property to set the base directory where the dynamic directory for the new application domain will be located. 新的应用程序域中的代码加载程序集、 程序集解析时看起来正常的探测路径中的第一行。When code in the new application domain loads an assembly, assembly resolution looks first in the normal probing paths. 如果找不到程序集，它在返回的动态目录中查找属性。If it does not find the assembly, it looks in the dynamic directory, which is returned by the property. 动态程序集将加载并执行新的应用程序域可以放置在此处。Dynamic assemblies that will be loaded and executed by the new application domain can be placed there. 在分配到的路径属性，添加其他子目录; 此子目录的名称是分配给的值的哈希代码属性。When you assign a path to the property, an additional subdirectory is added; the name of this subdirectory is the hash code of the value assigned to the property. 因此，随后返回此属性的基目录是始终不同于分配的值。Thus, the base directory subsequently returned by this property is always different from the value assigned. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将值分配给此属性不会创建任何目录。Assigning a value to this property does not create any directories. 必须创建的目录，或通过使用它们的代码来验证。The directories must be created or verified by the code that uses them. 动态目录是一个子目录的。The dynamic directory is a subdirectory of . 其简单名称是返回的值属性，因此其格式是*原始路径*\\*哈希代码*\\*应用程序的名称*.Its simple name is the value returned by the property, so its format is *original path*\\*hash code*\\*application name*. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来设置应用程序域的路径探测加载动态程序集时。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to set the path an application domain probes when loading dynamic assemblies. 此示例将创建对象并设置其属性设置为"示例"并将其属性设置为"C:\DynamicAssemblyDir"。The example creates an object and sets its property to "Example" and its property to "C:\DynamicAssemblyDir". 该示例然后显示属性，以显示应用程序名称的哈希代码具有已追加为最初分配的路径的子目录。The example then displays the property, to show that the hash code of the application name has been appended as a subdirectory of the path that was originally assigned. > [!NOTE] > 在此示例中的基目录被用于示例应用程序位于探测路径外部。The base directory in this example is intended to be outside the probing path for the example application. 请确保编译中的其他位置的示例。Be sure to compile the example in a different location. 每次运行该示例删除在基目录及其所有的子目录。Delete the base directory and all its subdirectories each time you run the example. 该示例创建一个新的应用程序域使用对象。The example creates a new application domain using the object. 如果尚不存在，该示例然后创建动态的目录。The example then creates the dynamic directory if it does not already exist. 尽管该示例使用应用程序域的属性来获取目录的名称动态，它可以轻松地创建目录事先通过串联的原始路径，应用程序名称的哈希代码和应用程序名称。Although the example uses the application domain's property to get the name of the dynamic directory, it could just as easily create the directory beforehand by concatenating the original path, the hash code of the application name, and the application name. 本示例具有`GenerateDynamicAssembly`方法发出的程序集名为`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`并将其存储在新应用程序域的动态目录。The example has a `GenerateDynamicAssembly` method that emits an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and stores it in the new application domain's dynamic directory. 动态程序集包含一种类型， `HelloWorld`，具有一个静态方法 (`Shared`方法在 Visual Basic 中的) 名为`HelloFromAD`。The dynamic assembly contains one type, `HelloWorld`, that has a static method (`Shared` method in Visual Basic) named `HelloFromAD`. 调用此方法显示应用程序域的名称。Calling this method displays the name of the application domain. `Example`类派生自，因此该示例可以创建类的实例中，新应用程序域并调用其`Test`方法。The `Example` class derives from , so the example can create an instance of the class in the new application domain and call its `Test` method. `Test`方法加载的动态程序集按其显示名称，并调用静态`HelloFromAD`方法。The `Test` method loads the dynamic assembly by its display name and calls the static `HelloFromAD` method. 可以显示后正常的探测路径搜索动态目录，通过编写代码的名为程序集`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`并将其编译为此示例中的相同目录中。You can show that the dynamic directory is searched after the normal probing paths by writing code for an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and compiling it in the same directory as this example. 程序集必须具有一个名为类`HelloWorld`与名为静态方法`HelloFromAD`。The assembly must have a class named `HelloWorld` with a static method named `HelloFromAD`. 此方法不需要具有相同的功能中这些示例。它可以只需将字符串显示到控制台。This method does not have to have the same functionality as the one in the example; it can simply display a string to the console. 程序集还必须具有设置其版本为 1.0.0.0 的属性。The assembly must also have an attribute that sets its version to 1.0.0.0. 运行示例时，动态目录中搜索之前，找到在当前目录中编译的程序集。When you run the example, the assembly you compiled in the current directory is found before the dynamic directory is searched. [!code-cpp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CPP/addynamicbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/CS/addynamicbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADDynamicBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDynamicBase/VB/addynamicbase.vb#1)]

exception.span: 无法设置此属性，因为应用程序域上的应用程序名称为 。

span.span: This property cannot be set because the application name on the application domain is .
for access to the path information.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetConfigurationBytes() cil managed

summary.span: 返回由 方法设置的 XML 配置信息，这些信息优先于应用程序的 XML 配置信息。

span.span: Returns the XML configuration information set by the method, which overrides the application's XML configuration information.

returns.span: 一个数组，其中包含由 方法设置的 XML 配置信息；如果未调用 方法，则为 。

span.span: An array that contains the XML configuration information that was set by the method, or if the method has not been called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种方法来重写创建新的应用程序域的应用程序的配置信息。The method provides a way to override the configuration information of an application that creates a new application domain. 中的配置文件信息`value`重写应用程序的配置文件信息。The configuration file information in `value` overrides the configuration file information for the application. 例如，当 Example.exe 应用程序创建新的应用程序域时，它会重写最初从 Example.exe.config 文件中获取的配置信息。For example, when the Example.exe application creates a new application domain, it can override the configuration information originally obtained from Example.exe.config file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 配置文件信息的一些使用者不使用存储的信息方法。Some consumers of configuration file information do not use the information stored by the method. 在运行时不强制这。The runtime does not enforce this. 若要确保新的应用程序域中重写所有配置文件信息，请使用属性来指定配置文件。To ensure that all configuration file information is overridden in a new application domain, use the property to specify a configuration file. 方法确实会影响程序集绑定。The method does affect assembly binding. 中的 XML`value`是在常规配置文件中，XML 相同，只不过它将存储为数组。The XML in `value` is the same as the XML in a normal configuration file, except that it is stored as a array. 若要访问应用程序域的配置字节，使用属性来获取对象的应用程序域，然后使用方法。To access the configuration bytes for an application domain, use the property to get the object for the application domain, then use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ LicenseFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.LicenseFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置与此域关联的许可证文件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of the license file associated with this domain.

span.span: The location and name of the license file.
for access to the path information.

summary.span: 指定用于加载可执行文件的优化策略。

span.span: Specifies the optimization policy used to load an executable.

value.span: 与 配合使用的枚举常数。

span.span: An enumerated constant that is used with the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例创建动态程序集并将其保存到磁盘，然后使用属性来设置用于将程序集加载到应用程序域的优化策略。The following example creates a dynamic assembly and saves it to disk, and then uses the property to set the optimization policy used to load the assembly into an application domain. [!code-cpp[ADDyno#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDyno/CPP/addyno.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ADDyno#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDyno/CS/addyno.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ADDyno#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ADDyno/VB/addyno.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ PartialTrustVisibleAssemblies { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };
member this.PartialTrustVisibleAssemblies : string[] with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置标以 标志的程序集的列表，这些程序集对沙箱应用程序域中的部分信任代码可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a list of assemblies marked with the flag that are made visible to partial-trust code running in a sandboxed application domain.

value.span: 部分程序集名称的数组，其中每个部分名称都由简单程序集名称和公钥组成。

span.span: An array of partial assembly names, where each partial name consists of the simple assembly name and the public key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，则(APTCA) 特性可为条件通过设置其属性设置为。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the (APTCA) attribute can be made conditional by setting its property to . 将标有 APTCA 程序集除非主机应用程序允许它不能由部分受信任的代码。An APTCA assembly that is marked with cannot be used by partially trusted code unless the host application allows it. 沙盒应用程序域的主机允许代码在应用程序域使用带有条件 APTCA 特性的程序集，通过创建一个数组，包含的简单名称和公钥的每个程序集，并将该数组分配给此属性。The host of a sandboxed application domain allows code in the application domain to use assemblies with conditional APTCA attributes by creating an array that contains the simple name and public key of each assembly, and assigning the array to this property. 例如，数组的元素可能如下所示:"MyAssembly，PublicKey "。For example, an element of the array might look like the following: "MyAssembly, ". > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果使用的子类，并将其定义的程序集取决于用条件 APTCA 特性标记的程序集，必须传递到列表中包含这些程序集属性用来创建应用程序域。If you are using a subclass of , and the assembly that defines it depends on assemblies that are marked with the conditional APTCA attribute, you must include those assemblies in the list that you pass to the property of the you use to create application domains. 否则，使用条件性 APTCA 特性标记的程序集将被禁用。Otherwise the assemblies that are marked with the conditional APTCA attribute will be disabled. > [!NOTE] > 在调试的应用程序在沙盒应用程序域中，运行时某些消息可能会产生误导。When you are debugging an application that is running in a sandboxed application domain, some messages can be misleading. 例如，一条消息可能状态，您完全受信任的程序集的一个只具有有限权限，该问题的真正原因时超出了沙盒应用程序域的授予集的安全需求已传播到的边界沙盒应用程序域和失败。For example, a message might state that one of your fully trusted assemblies has only limited permissions, when the real cause of the problem is that a security demand that exceeds the grant set of the sandboxed application domain has propagated to the boundary of the sandboxed application domain and failed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PrivateBinPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PrivateBinPath : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序基目录下的目录列表，这些目录被探测以寻找其中的私有程序集。

span.span: Gets or sets the list of directories under the application base directory that are probed for private assemblies.

value.span: 目录名称的列表，用分号分隔。

span.span: A list of directory names separated by semicolons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 专用程序集部署在与应用程序相同的目录结构中。Private assemblies are deployed in the same directory structure as the application. 如果为指定的目录下不是，它们将被忽略。If the directories specified for are not under , they are ignored.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串值，用于在应用程序的搜索路径中包含 ，或者从搜索路径中排除该基路径而只在 中进行搜索。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that includes or excludes from the search path for the application, and searches only .

value.span: 空引用（ Visual Basic 中的 ），包括搜索程序集时的应用程序基路径；要排除该路径的任何非空字符串值。

span.span: A null reference ( in Visual Basic) to include the application base path when searching for assemblies; any non-null string value to exclude the path.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此属性设置为任何非 null 字符串值，包括("")、 要排除的应用程序目录路径，即— 对于应用程序，以及要搜索的程序集的搜索路径中仅在。Set this property to any non-null string value, including (""), to exclude the application directory path — that is, — from the search path for the application, and to search for assemblies only in .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在应用程序域中为互操作调用禁用接口缓存，从而对每个调用执行 QueryInterface。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether interface caching is disabled for interop calls in the application domain, so that a QueryInterface is performed on each call.

value.span: 如果为使用当前 对象创建的应用程序域中的互操作调用禁用接口缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if interface caching is disabled for interop calls in application domains created with the current object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对性能的互操作调用禁用接口缓存产生重大影响。Disabling interface caching has a significant impact on the performance of interop calls. 此成员在中引入[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。This member is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetCompatibilitySwitches(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> switches) cil managed
Public Sub SetCompatibilitySwitches (switches As IEnumerable(Of String))

param.name: switches
param.span: 指定兼容性开关的字符串值的可枚举集或要擦除现有兼容性开关的 。

span.span: An enumerable set of string values that specify compatibility switches, or to erase the existing compatibility switches.

summary.span: 设置指定的开关，从而使应用程序域针对指定问题与早期版本的 .NET Framework 兼容。

span.span: Sets the specified switches, making the application domain compatible with previous versions of the .NET Framework for the specified issues.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要版本的.NET Framework 的先前版本中，有时会引入重大更改。Major versions of the .NET Framework sometimes introduce breaking changes from the previous version. 例如，[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]引入了少量的重大更改从[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。For example, the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] introduces a small number of breaking changes from the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]. 使用方法，以指定一个或多个这些重大更改应回滚应用程序域，以使此行为与以前版本的.NET framework 兼容。Use the method to specify that one or more of these breaking changes should be rolled back for the application domain, to make the behavior compatible with the previous version of the .NET Framework. 每次调用此方法，它将替换现有的交换机设置。Each time you call this method, it replaces the existing switch settings. 若要清除设置，指定`null`为`switches`参数。To erase the settings, specify `null` for the `switches` parameter. 为提供的字符串值的一套`switches`可以是简单的字符串数组，因为数组实现接口。The set of string values you provide for `switches` can be a simple string array, because arrays implement the interface. 下表提供了兼容性开关，可设置为还原的早期版本的.NET Framework 的行为的示例。The following table provides examples of compatibility switches that can be set to restore the behavior of earlier versions of the .NET Framework. |开关Switch|含义Meaning| |------------|-------------| |"NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy""NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy"|有关代码访问安全性 (CAS)[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]启用此应用程序域中。Code access security (CAS) for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 请参阅[ <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。See [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior"|字符串排序的默认值[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]在此应用程序域中启用。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] are enabled in this application domain. 已成功还原旧的排序行为还要求 sort00001000.dll 动态链接库在本地系统上可用。Successfully restoring legacy sorting behavior also requires the sort00001000.dll dynamic link library to be available on the local system. 请参阅[ <CompatSortNLSVersion>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md)。See [<CompatSortNLSVersion> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md).| |"NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior""NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior"|字符串排序的默认值[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，并且在此应用程序域中启用 Unicode 5.0。String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] and Unicode 5.0 are enabled in this application domain. 已成功还原旧的排序行为还需要为本地系统上可用的 sort00060101.dll 动态链接库。Successfully restoring legacy sorting behavior also requires the sort00060101.dll dynamic link library to be available on the local system.| |"NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode""NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode"| 格式设置行为的[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]启用此应用程序域中。 formatting behavior for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain. 请参阅[ <TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md)和"还原旧版 TimeSpan 格式设置"部分的主题。See [<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md) and the "Restoring Legacy TimeSpan Formatting" section of the topic.| |"UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm""UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm"|在运行时计算字符串的哈希代码对每个应用程序域而不是使用跨应用程序域生成一致的哈希代码的单个哈希算法。The runtime calculates hash codes for strings on a per application domain basis instead of using a single hashing algorithm that produces a consistent hash code across application domains. 请参阅[ <userandomizedstringhashalgorithm，那么>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md)。See [<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md).|

span.span: <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element
<CompatSortNLSVersion> Element
<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> Element
<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> Element

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetConfigurationBytes(unsigned int8[] value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 一个数组，其中包含要用于应用程序域的 XML 配置信息。

span.span: An array that contains the XML configuration information to be used for the application domain.

summary.span: 提供应用程序域的 XML 配置信息，并替换应用程序的 XML 配置信息。

span.span: Provides XML configuration information for the application domain, replacing the application's XML configuration information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种方法来替换创建新的应用程序域的应用程序的配置信息。The method provides a way to replace the configuration information of an application that creates a new application domain. 中的配置文件信息`value`替换应用程序的配置文件信息。The configuration file information in `value` replaces the configuration file information for the application. 例如，当 Example.exe 应用程序创建新的应用程序域时，它可以替换最初从 Example.exe.config 文件中获取的配置信息。For example, when the Example.exe application creates a new application domain, it can replace the configuration information originally obtained from the Example.exe.config file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 配置文件信息的一些使用者不使用存储的信息方法。Some consumers of configuration file information do not use the information stored by the method. 在运行时不强制这。The runtime does not enforce this. 若要确保所有配置文件信息将被都替换新的应用程序域中，使用属性来指定配置文件。To ensure that all configuration file information is replaced in a new application domain, use the property to specify a configuration file. 方法确实会影响程序集绑定。The method does affect assembly binding. 中的 XML`value`是在常规配置文件中，XML 相同，只不过它将存储为数组。The XML in `value` is the same as the XML in a normal configuration file, except that it is stored as a array.

span.span: Runtime Settings Schema

span.span: The function version.

param.span: [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]，必须为 1 或者 更大的数值。

span.span: For [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], its value must be 1 or greater.

param.span: 重写 functionName 的函数的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the function that overrides functionName.

summary.span: 向通用语言运行时提供备用字符串比较功能实现。

span.span: Provides the common language runtime with an alternate implementation of a string comparison function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的字符串比较和排序方法可以重写由方法：The following string comparison and sorting methods can be overridden by the method: - `IsNLSDefinedString` - `CompareStringEx` - `LCMapStringEx` - `FindNLSStringEx` - `CompareStringOrdinal` - `GetNLSVersion` 有关这些函数的信息，请参阅[国家/地区语言支持函数](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=228134)。For information about these functions, see [National Language Support Functions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=228134).

span.span: is .

exception.span: 不是 1 或者更大的值。

span.span: is not 1 or greater.
-or-
is .

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ShadowCopyDirectories { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ShadowCopyDirectories : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置目录的名称，这些目录包含要进行卷影复制的程序集。

span.span: Gets or sets the names of the directories containing assemblies to be shadow copied.

value.span: 目录名称的列表，用分号分隔。

span.span: A list of directory names separated by semicolons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用卷影复制后，默认值是通过探测; 找到的所有程序集的卷影复制也就是说，目录中指定和属性。When shadow copying is enabled, the default is to shadow copy all assemblies found through probing; that is, in the directories specified by the and properties. 属性中指定的目录的程序集限制在卷影副本。The property restricts the shadow copy to the assemblies in the directories specified by . 如果未将字符串分配至 属性或者将此属性设置为 `null`，则 和 属性指定的目录中的所有程序集均进行卷影复制。If you don’t assign a string to the property, or if you set this property to `null`, all assemblies in the directories specified by the and properties are shadow copied. > [!IMPORTANT] > 目录路径不能包含分号，因为分号是分隔符。Directory paths must not contain semicolons, because the semicolon is the delimiter character. 分号没有转义符。There is no escape character for semicolons. 卷影复制生效，程序集文件复制到其他位置，这些程序集加载之前。When shadow copying is in effect, assembly files are copied to another location before the assemblies are loaded. 原始程序集文件是没有锁定，因此对其进行更新。The original assembly file is not locked, so it can be updated. 卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅[卷影复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).

span.span: for access to the path information.
Associated enumeration:
Shadow Copying Assemblies

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ShadowCopyFiles { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ShadowCopyFiles : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指示卷影复制是打开还是关闭的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that indicates whether shadow copying is turned on or off.

value.span: 字符串值“true”指示打开了卷影复制；“false”则指示关闭了卷影复制。

span.span: The string value "true" to indicate that shadow copying is turned on; or "false" to indicate that shadow copying is turned off.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 卷影复制的详细信息，请参阅[卷影复制程序集](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).

span.span: Shadow Copying Assemblies

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TargetFrameworkName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TargetFrameworkName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置为应用程序域指定目标版本和 .NET Framework 配置文件的字符串，以可由 构造函数分析的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that specifies the target version and profile of the .NET Framework for the application domain, in a format that can be parsed by the constructor.

value.span: .NET Framework 的目标版本和配置文件。

span.span: The target version and profile of the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性告知当前正在运行的.NET framework 版本，应用程序域将用于加载和运行已编译的目标版本和配置文件的程序集。Set this property to tell the currently running version of the .NET Framework that the application domain will be used to load and run assemblies that have been compiled for the target version and profile. 如果当前正在运行的.NET framework 版本的影响的目标版本编译的代码的兼容性的可选行为，它可以启用或禁用这些行为，根据需要，以提高兼容性。If the currently running version of the .NET Framework has optional behaviors that affect the compatibility of code that was compiled with the target version, it can enable or disable those behaviors, as appropriate, to improve compatibility. 在应用程序支持与多个版本的.NET Framework 编译的在单独的应用程序域中运行它们的加载项，这很有用。This can be useful when an application supports add-ins compiled with multiple versions of the .NET Framework by running them in separate application domains. 对于客户端应用程序，值属性来推断属性。For client applications, the value of the property is inferred from the attribute. 在中[!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)]和更高版本，此特性添加到自动基于项目的设置的程序集**目标框架**属性。In [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] and later, this attribute is added to the assembly automatically based on the setting of the project's **Target Framework** property.
